scenes.description: Creating a plan is great, but do you think we can rely on everyone to follow it?

options.text: We can ensure compliance through regular training sessions.
options.analysis: You suggest a practical solution, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy and perception could be stronger.

options.text: It's challenging, but with the right incentives, we can motivate everyone to follow it.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the challenge and propose incentives, demonstrating good perception and social skills, but self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: Trust is key, Bob. We need to believe that everyone will do their part.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of trust, showing good self-regulation but could improve on perception and empathy.
